m_szDocSumamry: News:Archive:2007:May May May 31, 2007 Engines > Reinventing the engine - Brad Raether has developed a new piston and cylinder wall design ( WaveTech ) that transforms linear power into rotary power 3x more efficiently than the 300 year old piston and crankshaft. Among the potential results: Production automobiles that get 75 to 100 miles per gallon, with minimal changes to their standard engines. (The Bulletin; May 22, 2007) (Thanks KeelyNet ) Solar Vehicles / Hybrids > Using Solar Roofs To Power Hybrids - Solar Electrical Vehicles is adding a convex solar roof to hybrid cars like the Toyota
